content: MFT-UZ Rail Rail for two-layer horizontal-vertical system ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Profiles- - - ### FEATURES:Features Labor saving – optimized design help to lower your total cost of installation Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Applications UZ support rail for the second layer of the substructure to build the ventilation space Support rail in the middle of the facade panel Support rail for two-layer horizontal-vertical system ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 6000 mm Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Material thickness: 1.9 mm Technical Data | Length | 6000 mm | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 | Material thickness | 1.9 mm | Surface finish | flat ### ITEMS- 2029793 - Profile MFT-UZ 60x25x1,9 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2029795 - Profile MFT-UZ 40x29,8x1,9 6m - Package Size 6 m - 2029381 - Profile MFT-UZ 40x29,8x1,9 6m perf. - Package Size 6 m
